about_the_game:
This DLC will give you access to 3 different gamemodes.

- HARDPOINT
- KILL CONFIRMED (Early ProtoType)
- INFECTED (W.I.P)

Base game includes:

- DeathMatch
- Team DeathMatch
- Domination
detailed_description:
This DLC will give you access to 3 different gamemodes.

- HARDPOINT
- KILL CONFIRMED (Early ProtoType)
- INFECTED (W.I.P)

Base game includes:

- DeathMatch
- Team DeathMatch
- Domination
